general_advisory: Present condition is favorable for monsoon advancement. Light rain is expected in the coming five days so farmers may continue irrigation in standing crops.

advisory: Green manuring crops are sown in medium and low land conditions at 6-8 weeks before planting. Use 10 kg seeds per acre. Otherwise 6 kg/acre in case of mixed planting with paddy. Sowing time should be adjusted in such a way that the crop will attain a 5-week stage just at 7 days before transplanting. Apply all the recommended doses of phosphorous of rice (100 kg of SSP) to the field during sowing time.
Farmers can go for the sowing of sweet corn in appropriate soil moisture conditions.
To control Yellow Vain Mosaic Virus (YVMV) in Okra apply Neem oil (10000 ppm) @ 20 ml/10 liter or use yellow sticky trap. For chemical control spray Metalyxyl+Mancozeb/Carboxin+Thiram@2g/litre.

Weather is favorable for Downy Mildew in cucurbit vegetables. To manage this disease in cucurbits spray Copper Hydroxide 77 % WP 12 @ 3-gram/litre or Carbendazim 12 % + Mancozeb 63 % WP @ 2-gram/litre.
